license: Proprietary (Google AI for Developers / Gemini API Terms)

provenance.notes: Public Gemini API models include 1.5 Pro/Flash, 2.0 Flash, and 3.0 Pro variants; multimodal support and long-context per docs. Gemini 3.0 released November 2025.

architecture_details: Proprietary multimodal transformer; long-context support in select variants (e.g., 1.5 Pro experimental 1M tokens per docs).

size_params.activated_params_note: Parameter counts not publicly disclosed; API-managed deployment.

hardware_recommendations.notes: Hosted via Gemini API; client-side compute not applicable.
Hosted via Gemini API; optimized for speed/cost.
Hosted via Gemini API; newer generation Flash variant.
Hosted via Gemini API; trained on TPUs. Supports 1M token input context and up to 64k token output. Features Deep Think mode for advanced reasoning.

inference.notes: Use Gemini API clients; see ai.google.dev for SDKs and model features.

notes: Data derived from Google AI for Developers Gemini docs and public announcements. Parameter counts not disclosed; numeric placeholders used to satisfy schema. Gemini 3.0 Pro released Nov 2025 with enhanced reasoning, 1M context window, and Deep Think mode achieving 45.1% on ARC-AGI-2 and 93.8% on GPQA Diamond.
